decision_conditions: Condition : 1 - The development hereby permitted shall be begun before the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.

Condition : 2 - The proposed development shall be carried out in all respects in accordance with the proposals contained in the application and the plans submitted (P101, P201 and Design and Access Statement received 08/03/2017. P202 Rev A received on 27/03/2017.) therewith and approved by the Local Planning Authority, or as shall have been otherwise agreed in writing by the Local Planning Authority before the building is used.

Condition : 3 - The standalone store room hereby approved (labelled 'standalone cold room on plan P202 rev A) shall not be used other than as an ancillary store to the use of the premises as a mixed use restaurant and takeaway (Use Class A3/A5).

Condition : 4 - Notwithstanding the submitted plans, and prior to installation, full details of the extraction duct shall be submitted to and approved in writing by the Local Planning Authority. No fans, louvres, ducts or other external plant, other than those hereby approved, shall be installed without the prior approval of the Local Planning Authority.

Condition : 5 - The rating level of sound emitted from the plant equipment hereby approved shall not exceed background sound levels by more than 5dB(A) between the hours of 0700-2300 (taken as a 15 minute LA90 at the nearest sound sensitive premises) and shall not exceed the background sound level between 2300-0700 (taken as a 15 minute LA90 at the nearest sound sensitive premises). All measurements shall be made in accordance with the methodology of BS4142 : 2014 (Methods for rating and assessing industrial and commercial sound) and/or its subsequent amendments.
o Where access to the nearest sound sensitive property is not possible, measurements shall be undertaken at an appropriate location and corrected to establish the noise levels at the nearest sound sensitive property.
o Any deviations from the LA90 time interval stipulated above shall be agreed in writing with the local planning authority.
Condition : 6 - The use hereby permitted for mixed use A3 and A5 purposes shall not be carried on outside the following times 08.00am to 0.00am Monday to Sundays, including Bank Holidays
Condition : 7 - No servicing of the premises shall take place other than from the rear service / access road.
description: Change of use from dental surgery (use class D1 to mixed restaurant (use class A3) and takeaway (use class A5)  use and change of opening hours to Monday to Sunday 08:00 a.m. to 00:00 a.m.
